name: INNERFIGHT - TEAM 17
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT, COME BACK A BIT LATER AND IT SHOULD BE GOOD!

Five, a young schizophrenic girl, sees her reflection insulting and demeans her everyday.

She will therefore try to undergo treatment, but will everything go as planned?

Play as one of Five’s spirits, the healthy or the sick one, in a psychological fight!

Five will have to prevent the horror spoken by Veif, her reflection, from reaching her mind.

Defeat your opponent to determine the mental outcome of Five!

INNERFIGHT is an asymmetrical 1v1 shooter in which you will either play as Five or Veif, the mean reflection of Five. In this shooter, you won’t be shooting bullets but words! 

Veif has the ability to choose and teleport herself into any mirrors on the map, allowing her to aim and attack Five with mean sentences. With the right timing, Five can shoot on them and send them back to shut down mirrors for a short amount of time, after which they will respawn.

But take care, Veif has more than one trick up her sleeves! One at a time, a mirror will get buffed and the next shot of Veif will have a special capacity (Faster, unstoppable, larger…).

PLAYER 1:
KEYBOARD :
Arrows : movement
Mouse : Aim
Left click : Shoot

PLAYER 2:

GAMEPAD
 X/Y/A/B/LB/LT : Select a mirror 
Left stick : Aim
RB / RT : Shoot
